segments.text: Read Jimmy's card to me please , Janey .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have just arrived in Scotland and I'm staying at a Youth Hostel .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He says he's just arrived in Scotland . He says he's staying at a Youth Hostel . You know he's a member of the Y . H . A .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The Y . H . A . , mun . The Youth Hostel's Association .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll write a letter soon . I hope you are all well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ? Speak up , Janey . I'm afraid I can't hear you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He says he'll write a letter soon . He hopes we are all well . Love , Jimmy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is that all ? He doesn't say very much , does he ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He can't write very much on a card , mum .
segments.speaker: S2
